definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
abbr. for 論語|论语[Lun2 yu3], The Analects (of Confucius)
opinion/view/theory/doctrine/to discuss/to talk about/to regard/to consider/per/by the (kilometer, hour etc)

sentences.english: Any general claim will be belied by a particular experience.
sentences.chinese: 任何一概而論的說法都會被具體經歷推翻。

sentences.english: But I believe that is no longer universally true.
sentences.chinese: 但我認爲不能再一概而論的了。

sentences.english: Of course, the people of the Middle East are not a singular "them.
sentences.chinese: 當然，中東的人口不能用“他們”一詞一概而論。

sentences.english: Condyloma acuminatum treatment costs can not be generalized.
sentences.chinese: 尖銳溼疣治療費用不能一概而論。
